team.name: Sarah Chen
team.bio: With over 20 years of experience in strategic consulting, Sarah founded Stratosphere to help businesses reach their full potential. She holds an MBA from Wharton and has led transformations for Fortune 500 companies.

team.name: Michael Torres
team.bio: Michael brings 15 years of experience in corporate strategy and business development. He specializes in market entry strategies and has helped numerous startups scale successfully.

team.name: Emily Johnson
team.bio: Emily leads our digital transformation practice, helping companies modernize their operations and embrace new technologies. She has a background in both technology and business strategy.

team.name: David Kim
team.bio: David specializes in operational efficiency and process optimization. He has helped companies reduce costs by up to 30% while improving quality and customer satisfaction.

team.name: Lisa Patel
team.bio: Lisa designs and delivers executive coaching and leadership development programs. She is a certified executive coach with a PhD in Organizational Psychology.

team.name: James Wilson
team.bio: James focuses on competitive analysis and market positioning strategies. He has extensive experience in the technology and healthcare sectors.

team.name: Maria Garcia
team.bio: Maria helps companies develop comprehensive digital strategies that drive growth. She specializes in e-commerce and digital marketing transformation.

team.name: Robert Chang
team.bio: Robert specializes in supply chain optimization and lean manufacturing. He has helped companies achieve significant improvements in efficiency and cost reduction.

departments.name: Leadership
departments.description: Executive team and leadership development specialists

departments.name: Strategy
departments.description: Strategic planning and business development experts

departments.name: Operations
departments.description: Operational excellence and process improvement specialists
